channel.title: Getting Started on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Product Overview
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Benefits 1.1 Rich Features 1.2 Platform Independence 1.3 Performance and Scalability 2 Technical Support 3 Resources || Welcome to the Aspose.Cells for C++ documentation section Aspose.Cells for C++ is a native C++ library that enables C++ developers to create, manipulate and convert spreadsheets programmatically without requiring Office Automation or Microsoft Excel application. The Aspose.

item.title: Supported File Formats
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Supported File Formats || Supported File Formats Format Description Load Save XLS Excel 95/5.0 - 2003 Workbook. XLSX Office Open XML SpreadsheetML Workbook or template file, with or without macros. XLSB Excel Binary Workbook. XLSM Excel Macro-Enabled Workbook.

item.title: System Requirements
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Supported Operating Systems 1.1 Windows 2 Development Environments || Supported Operating Systems Windows Microsoft Windows 2003 Server ( x64, x86) Microsoft Windows 2008 Server ( x64, x86) Microsoft Windows 2012 Server ( x64, x86) Microsoft Windows XP ( x64, x86) Microsoft Windows Vista ( x64, x86) Microsoft Windows 7 ( x64, x86) Microsoft Windows 8, 8.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Installing Aspose.Cells for C++ 1.1 Using Nuget Package Manager 1.2 Using Include and lib Folders || Installing Aspose.Cells for C++ Using Nuget Package Manager In Nuget Package Manager, search for Aspose.Cells. Here is the Link to NuGet Package Aspose.Cells.Cpp. It will list the API as Aspose.Cells.Cpp. Press the Add button to install the package You can also download ZIP package from the Aspose.

item.title: Licensing
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Evaluation Version Limitations 2 Apply License using File or Stream Object 2.1 Loading a License from File 2.2 Loading a License from a Stream Object || Evaluation Version Limitations A free evaluation version of Aspose.Cells for C++ can be downloaded from the downloads section of Aspose’s web site at: https://downloads.aspose.com/cells/cpp. Apply License using File or Stream Object

item.title: How to Run the Examples
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Software Requirements 2 Download from GitHub 3 Contribute || Software Requirements Please make sure you meet the following requirements before downloading and running the examples. Visual Studio 2015 or higher Download from GitHub All examples of Aspose.Cells for C++ are hosted on GitHub. You can either clone the repository using your favorite GitHub client or download the ZIP file from here.
